name: hebrew-date-zmanim
title: Hebrew Date & Zmanim
description: Hebrew date converter + full Kosher Zmanim with fuzzy search for Raycast.
author: mendel_g

commands.name: to-hebrew
commands.title: Gregorian → Hebrew
commands.subtitle: Convert a civil date to a Hebrew date
commands.description: Pick a date and get its Hebrew equivalent

preferences.name: afterSunsetShift
preferences.title: Treat selected time as after sunset (beyn hashmashot)

commands.name: to-gregorian
commands.title: Hebrew → Gregorian
commands.subtitle: Convert a Hebrew date to a civil date
commands.description: Enter a Hebrew date (e.g., 7 Elul 5785 or כ""ז בתמוז תשפ""ג)

commands.name: today-hebrew
commands.title: Today in Hebrew (Menu Bar)
commands.subtitle: Show today's Hebrew date
commands.description: Displays today's Hebrew date in the menu bar.

preferences.name: menuAfterSunsetShift
preferences.title: After sunset shift
preferences.description: Simple +1-day shift to approximate the Hebrew day starting at sundown.

commands.name: zmanim
commands.title: Kosher Zmanim (Fuzzy Search)
commands.subtitle: Compute halachic times for a date & location
commands.description: Powered by kosher-zmanim. Search/Copy all zmanim.
